hero.experienceLegend: 3+ years of experience in web development

about.title: About Me
about.heading: I'm a passionate web developer with experience in modern technologies
about.description1: I'm a passionate web developer with experience in modern technologies and frameworks. I love creating intuitive and efficient solutions that solve real-world problems.
about.description2: With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend development, I enjoy working on challenging projects that push the boundaries of what's possible on the web.
about.name: Name

adaptability.title: Adaptability
adaptability.description: I quickly adapt to new technologies and changing environments, embracing challenges as opportunities for growth and learning.

investigative.title: Research & Analysis
investigative.description: I thoroughly investigate problems and analyze solutions, ensuring well-informed decisions and optimal outcomes in every project.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: I bring creative thinking and innovative approaches to solve complex problems and create unique user experiences.

attention.title: Attention to Detail
attention.description: I maintain high standards of quality and precision in my work, ensuring every detail meets professional excellence.

initiative.title: Initiative
initiative.description: I proactively identify opportunities for improvement and take decisive action to drive projects forward.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: I collaborate effectively with diverse teams, fostering communication and contributing to collective success.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Get in touch
contact.name: Name
contact.error: Error sending message. Please try again.

footer.description: Passionate developer creating innovative digital solutions with modern technologies and best practices.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: This Privacy Policy describes how {{name}} collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you visit and use this website.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.description: We may collect the following types of information:

items.contactInfo: Contact information (name, email, phone) when you reach out to us
items.technicalData: Technical information about your device and browser

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.description: We use collected information for the following purposes:

items.communication: To respond to your inquiries and communicate with you
items.improvement: To improve our website and user experience
items.analytics: To analyze website performance and user behavior

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information only when required by law or to protect our rights.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: Our website uses cookies to enhance your experience. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated date.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text: Welcome to {{name}}'s portfolio website. These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

userConduct.title: User Conduct
userConduct.description: When using our website, you agree to:

items.lawful: Use the website for lawful purposes only
items.respectful: Interact respectfully with our content and services
items.noHarm: Not attempt to harm or disrupt our website
items.noSpam: Not send spam or unsolicited communications

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All content on this website, including text, images, code, and design, is owned by the website owner and protected by copyright laws.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: This website is provided 'as is' without any warranties. We do not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of information provided.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.description: We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of this website.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our website at any time without prior notice.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We may modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of modified terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
